body:
Previous version used a patch file to inject a CMake build file.
This CMake file didn't handle the OpenMP support, nor the handling of the FFTW dependency.

This moves to using the shipped Makefile, however it requires some heavy modification to integrate with Spack, I think I have hit them all.

This now enables the package to be used with multiple compilers and FFTW implementations.
Tested with GCC, ACfL and NVHPC and FFTW and ArmPL (for `fftw-api`).
title: tinker: Remove CMake
